title: New: LOUDS – Ways
content:
Philadelphia outfit LOUDS seem like a hell of a lot of fun.

From the jovial sound of their debut track, Ways, to their heart-warming honesty: “the music’s a lot fresher than our pr skills”, not forgetting the fantastic title of their forthcoming LP, If More People Bought Art More People Would Buy Art, they appear to be people who would be the life and soul of any party. That in itself is a pretty fitting description of their music; upbeat yet laid-back summer vibes. Check out Ways below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
